nodes.text: Ubialla Gheal was a female who owned a club in Canto Bight.

Gheal was portrayed by Sema-Tawi Smart in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi,[source?] although she is only credited as "creature performer" in the actual film. Smart would then go to appear as Aurodia Ventafoli in the 2018 Star Wars Anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
